20101224071021.000|20101224071022.000|CC1|WITHOUT THEIR CONSENT.          
20101224071022.000|20101224071024.000|CC1|THEY DID NOT KNOW THAT THE CELLS
20101224071024.000|20101224071026.000|CC1|HAD BEEN GROWN.                 
20101224071026.000|20101224071029.000|CC1|SHE HAD FIVE KIDS WHEN SHE DIED 
20101224071029.000|20101224071030.000|CC1|AND SHE DIED IN 1951.           
20101224071030.000|20101224071032.000|CC1|TO LEARN MORE, SCIENTISTS       
20101224071032.000|20101224071034.000|CC1|DECIDED TO TRACK DOWN HER KIDS  
20101224071034.000|20101224071036.000|CC1|AND DO RESEARCH ON THEM.        
20101224071036.000|20101224071039.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND HAD A THIRD GRADE   
20101224071039.000|20101224071040.000|CC1|EDUCATION AND DID NOT KNOW AND  
20101224071040.000|20101224071043.000|CC1|HE GOT THIS PHONE CALL ONE DAY. 
20101224071043.000|20101224071044.000|CC1|THE WAY HE UNDERSTOOD IT WAS WE 
20101224071044.000|20101224071048.000|CC1|HAVE YOUR WIFE AND SHE IS ALIVE 
20101224071048.000|20101224071049.000|CC1|IN A LABORATORY OR PART OF HER  
20101224071049.000|20101224071050.000|CC1|AND WE HAVE BEEN DOING RESEARCH 
20101224071050.000|20101224071053.000|CC1|ON HER FOR 25 YEARS AND WE HAVE 
20101224071053.000|20101224071054.000|CC1|TO TEST YOUR KIDS TO SEE IF     
20101224071054.000|20101224071056.000|CC1|THERE IS CANCER.                
20101224071056.000|20101224071057.000|CC1|TAVIS: THAT IS HOW THEY FOUND   
20101224071057.000|20101224071101.000|CC1|OUT 20 PLUS YEARS LATER.        
20101224071101.000|20101224071104.000|CC1|>> HER CHILDREN WERE AROUND AGE 
20101224071104.000|20101224071105.000|CC1|OF 30 AND THEY THOUGHT THEY WERE

20101224071804.000|20101224071807.000|CC1|>> I AM A DAUGHTER OF THE GREAT 
20101224071807.000|20101224071809.000|CC1|MIGRATION.                      
20101224071809.000|20101224071809.000|CC1|THE AFRICAN-AMERICAN TO MEET OUR
20101224071809.000|20101224071811.000|CC1|PRODUCTS OF THE GREAT MIGRATION.

20101224071814.000|20101224071816.000|CC1|MANY OF US OWE OUR EXISTENCE TO

20101224071819.000|20101224071822.000|CC1|MY MOTHER MIGRATED TO           
20101224071822.000|20101224071824.000|CC1|WASHINGTON, D.C. AND MY FATHER

20101224071829.000|20101224071831.000|CC1|HAD IT NOT BEEN FOR THE GREAT   
20101224071831.000|20101224071833.000|CC1|MIGRATION, I WOULD NOT EXIST.   
20101224071833.000|20101224071835.000|CC1|THE STORY WAS NOT BEING TOLD

20101224071836.000|20101224071837.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO LIVE THIS.           
20101224071837.000|20101224071839.000|CC1|WE DID NOT KNOW WHY THEY LEFT OR
20101224071839.000|20101224071840.000|CC1|HOW THEY MADE THE DECISION TO   
20101224071840.000|20101224071840.000|CC1|LEAVE.                          
20101224071840.000|20101224071842.000|CC1|WHAT WERE THEIR LIVES LIKE?     
20101224071842.000|20101224071844.000|CC1|HOW DID THEY GET THE COURAGE TO 
20101224071844.000|20101224071846.000|CC1|LEAVE THE PLACE THEY HAD NEVER  
20101224071846.000|20101224071850.000|CC1|KNOWN TO LEAVE FOR AN UNCERTAIN 
20101224071850.000|20101224071852.000|CC1|FUTURE, A PLACE THAT WAS NOT A  
20101224071852.000|20101224071852.000|CC1|WELCOMING?                      
20101224071852.000|20101224071853.000|CC1|HOW DID THEY MAKE IT ONCE THEY  
20101224071853.000|20101224071855.000|CC1|GOT THERE?                      
20101224071855.000|20101224071855.000|CC1|THOSE WERE THE KINDS OF         
20101224071855.000|20101224071857.000|CC1|QUESTIONS I HAD AND THE         
20101224071857.000|20101224071858.000|CC1|QUESTIONS THAT GAVE US A SENSE  
20101224071858.000|20101224071901.000|CC1|OF HOW THE CITY'S CAME TO BE AND
20101224071901.000|20101224071903.000|CC1|HOW SO MANY AFRICAN-AMERICANS   
20101224071903.000|20101224071906.000|CC1|ENDED UP IN DETROIT, CHICAGO,   
20101224071906.000|20101224071909.000|CC1|LOS ANGELES, NEW YORK.          
20101224071909.000|20101224071911.000|CC1|TAVIS: AFTER KATRINA, I WAS ON  
20101224071911.000|20101224071913.000|CC1|THE AIR HERE AND I RAILED EVERY 
20101224071913.000|20101224071915.000|CC1|NIGHT ON THIS PROGRAM AND       
20101224071915.000|20101224071916.000|CC1|EVERYWHERE WHERE I APPEARED     
20101224071916.000|20101224071918.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT KATRINA.          
20101224071918.000|20101224071919.000|CC1|I REELED ON THE MEDIA.          
20101224071919.000|20101224071921.000|CC1|I COULD NOT STAND THE MEDIA     
20101224071921.000|20101224071923.000|CC1|PICKING UP ON THIS TERM OF      
20101224071923.000|20101224071925.000|CC1|REFUGEE TO REFER TO THESE BLACK 
20101224071925.000|20101224071927.000|CC1|MEN AND WOMEN WHO WERE AMERICAN 
20101224071927.000|20101224071928.000|CC1|CITIZENS.                       
20101224071928.000|20101224071929.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT REFUGEES.           
20101224071929.000|20101224071932.000|CC1|I SAID OVER AND OVER AGAIN.     
20101224071932.000|20101224071934.000|CC1|IT WAS IMPORTANT TO MAKE THAT   
20101224071934.000|20101224071935.000|CC1|POINT SO WE WOULD NOT LOSE SIGHT
20101224071935.000|20101224071936.000|CC1|OF THE FACT THAT THESE PEOPLE   
20101224071936.000|20101224071938.000|CC1|ARE US.                         
20101224071938.000|20101224071940.000|CC1|>> I REFER TO THEM AS           
20101224071940.000|20101224071942.000|CC1|IMMIGRANTS.                     
20101224071942.000|20101224071944.000|CC1|AS HAVING THE SAME KIND OF      
20101224071944.000|20101224071946.000|CC1|IMMIGRANT HEART AND MOTIVATION  
20101224071946.000|20101224071947.000|CC1|AND DESIRES AND GOALS AND       
20101224071947.000|20101224071949.000|CC1|DREAMS AS ANY PERSON WHO MIGHT  
20101224071949.000|20101224071951.000|CC1|HAVE CROSSED THE ECLECTIC.      
20101224071951.000|20101224071953.000|CC1|WHAT I AM LOOKING AT IS THE FACT
20101224071953.000|20101224071958.000|CC1|THAT WHAT IS PROPELLING THEM, IT
20101224071958.000|20101224072000.000|CC1|IS A CLASSIC STORY.             
20101224072000.000|20101224072002.000|CC1|HOW TRAGIC THEY ENDED UP TO FAR 
20101224072002.000|20101224072003.000|CC1|REACHES OF THEIR OWN COUNTRY IN 
20101224072003.000|20101224072007.000|CC1|ORDER TO FIND FREEDOM THAT THEY 
20101224072007.000|20101224072008.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE BEEN BORN TO.        
20101224072008.000|20101224072010.000|CC1|WHEN I USE IT, I AM USING IT IN 
20101224072010.000|20101224072012.000|CC1|A WAY OF A PROVOCATIVE TERM TO  
20101224072012.000|20101224072013.000|CC1|GET US TO THINK ABOUT THIS      
20101224072013.000|20101224072014.000|CC1|DIFFERENTLY.                    
20101224072014.000|20101224072016.000|CC1|THEY WERE DOING WHAT SO MANY    
20101224072016.000|20101224072018.000|CC1|GROUPS OF PEOPLE ARE LAUDED FOR 
20101224072018.000|20101224072019.000|CC1|DOING.                          
20101224072019.000|20101224072021.000|CC1|THEY CAME TO THE CITIES WITHOUT 
20101224072021.000|20101224072023.000|CC1|ANY BACKUP.                     
20101224072023.000|20101224072025.000|CC1|THEY TOOK -- LIVED IN           
20101224072025.000|20101224072027.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOODS WHERE THEY WERE   
20101224072027.000|20101224072029.000|CC1|CONFINED TO.                    
20101224072029.000|20101224072030.000|CC1|THEY DOUBLED UP IN HOMES OR     
20101224072030.000|20101224072032.000|CC1|APARTMENTS OR COLD WATER FLATS  
20101224072032.000|20101224072034.000|CC1|AND TOOK MULTIPLE JOBS AND MADE 
20101224072034.000|20101224072035.000|CC1|MORE MONEY OFTEN IN THE         
20101224072035.000|20101224072037.000|CC1|AGGREGATE THAN THE PEOPLE WHO   
20101224072037.000|20101224072038.000|CC1|WERE THERE ALREADY.             
20101224072038.000|20101224072039.000|CC1|THEY WERE WORKING HARD IN ORDER 
20101224072039.000|20101224072041.000|CC1|TO SURVIVE, WHICH IS THE CLASSIC
20101224072041.000|20101224072044.000|CC1|AMERICAN STORY AND THE CLASSIC  
20101224072044.000|20101224072044.000|CC1|IMMIGRANT STORY.                
20101224072044.000|20101224072046.000|CC1|THEY HAD TO DO THAT WITHIN THEIR
20101224072046.000|20101224072048.000|CC1|OWN COUNTRY.                    
20101224072048.000|20101224072052.000|CC1|THEY WERE NOT IMMIGRANTS.       
20101224072052.000|20101224072057.000|CC1|TAVIS: TELL ME ABOUT IDA MAE.   
20101224072057.000|20101224072102.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS TERRIBLE AT PICKING  
20101224072102.000|20101224072102.000|CC1|COTTON.                         
20101224072102.000|20101224072106.000|CC1|SHE KILLED SNAKES AND WRING THE 
20101224072106.000|20101224072111.000|CC1|NECK OF A CHICKEN BUT COULD NOT 
20101224072111.000|20101224072111.000|CC1|PICK COTTON.                    
20101224072111.000|20101224072113.000|CC1|HER FAMILY ENDED UP HAVING TO   
20101224072113.000|20101224072116.000|CC1|LEAVE BECAUSE A RELATIVE HAD    
20101224072116.000|20101224072118.000|CC1|BEEN BEATEN TO WITHIN AN INCH OF
20101224072118.000|20101224072119.000|CC1|HIS LIFE BECAUSE HE HAD BEEN    
20101224072119.000|20101224072122.000|CC1|ACCUSED OF A THEFT HE HAD NOT   
20101224072122.000|20101224072122.000|CC1|COMMITTED.                      
20101224072122.000|20101224072125.000|CC1|THE SAME THING THE ACCUSED HIM  
20101224072125.000|20101224072126.000|CC1|OF STEALING TURNED UP THE NEXT  
20101224072126.000|20101224072129.000|CC1|DAY.                            
20101224072129.000|20101224072130.000|CC1|WHEN HER HUSBAND FOUND OUT WHAT 
20101224072130.000|20101224072132.000|CC1|HAD HAPPENED TO HIS COUSIN, HE  
20101224072132.000|20101224072134.000|CC1|WENT HOME TO HIS WIFE AND SAID, 
20101224072134.000|20101224072137.000|CC1|THIS IS THE LAST CROP BY MAKING.
20101224072137.000|20101224072139.000|CC1|-- I AM MAKING.                 
20101224072139.000|20101224072140.000|CC1|THEY ENDED UP IN CHICAGO FOR    
20101224072140.000|20101224072144.000|CC1|MISSISSIPPI.                    
20101224072144.000|20101224072148.000|CC1|FOR THAT MIGRATION.             
20101224072148.000|20101224072149.000|CC1|ROBERT FOSTER WAS A SURGEON WHO 
20101224072149.000|20101224072153.000|CC1|HAD PERFORMED ABLY AND WAS OF   
20101224072153.000|20101224072154.000|CC1|DISTINCTION IN THE ARMY BUT HE  
20101224072154.000|20101224072156.000|CC1|GOT OUT AND FOUND HE COULD NOT  
20101224072156.000|20101224072158.000|CC1|PRACTICE SURGERY IN HIS         
20101224072158.000|20101224072200.000|CC1|HOMETOWN IN LOUISIANA.          
20101224072200.000|20101224072204.000|CC1|HE SET OUT ON A COURSE THAT     
20101224072204.000|20101224072205.000|CC1|ENDED UP BEING MORE TREACHEROUS 
20101224072205.000|20101224072206.000|CC1|THAN HE ANTICIPATED TO GET TO   
20101224072206.000|20101224072209.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.                     
20101224072209.000|20101224072213.000|CC1|TAVIS: HE ENDED UP BEING RAY    
20101224072213.000|20101224072216.000|CC1|CHARLES' DOCTOR.                
20101224072216.000|20101224072218.000|CC1|DOES THAT SAY SOMETHING ABOUT   
20101224072218.000|20101224072220.000|CC1|THE FOLKS WHO STAYED BEHIND, BUT
20101224072220.000|20101224072220.000|CC1|THOSE WHO DID NOT GO?           
20101224072220.000|20101224072222.000|CC1|>> THERE IS A WAY OF LOOKING AT 
20101224072222.000|20101224072225.000|CC1|THEM THAT IS ALSO A BEAUTIFUL.  
20101224072225.000|20101224072226.000|CC1|THERE WERE THE KEEPERS OF THE   
20101224072226.000|20101224072227.000|CC1|CULTURE.                        
20101224072227.000|20101224072228.000|CC1|THEY WERE THE KEEPERS.          
20101224072228.000|20101224072229.000|CC1|SOME WOULD SAY WE NEED TO STAY  
20101224072229.000|20101224072232.000|CC1|HERE SO YOU HAVE A PLACE TO COME
20101224072232.000|20101224072233.000|CC1|BACK TO WHEN YOU NEED TO.       
20101224072233.000|20101224072235.000|CC1|I THOUGHT THAT WAS BEAUTIFUL.   
20101224072235.000|20101224072237.000|CC1|TOGETHER, THIS MIGRATION WAS THE
20101224072237.000|20101224072239.000|CC1|PRECURSOR TO THE CIVIL RIGHTS   
20101224072239.000|20101224072240.000|CC1|MOVEMENT IN MANY RESPECTS.      
20101224072240.000|20101224072245.000|CC1|ONE WAY BECAUSE IT SHOWED THIS  
20101224072245.000|20101224072248.000|CC1|UNDERPAID, LOWER LEVEL OF THE   
20101224072248.000|20101224072250.000|CC1|CASTE SYSTEM OF THE SOUTH.      
20101224072250.000|20101224072253.000|CC1|THE UNDERPAID WORKERS OF THE    
20101224072253.000|20101224072254.000|CC1|SOUTH HAD AN OPTION AND WERE    
20101224072254.000|20101224072255.000|CC1|WILLING TO TAKE IT.             
20101224072255.000|20101224072257.000|CC1|THEY WERE WILLING TO ACT ON THAT
20101224072257.000|20101224072258.000|CC1|OPTION WHICH WAS TO LEAVE.      
20101224072258.000|20101224072303.000|CC1|WHEN THIS BEGAN, 90% OF AFRICAN-
20101224072303.000|20101224072304.000|CC1|AMERICANS LIVING IN THE SOUTH.  
20101224072304.000|20101224072307.000|CC1|BY THE TIME IT WAS OVER, NEARLY 
20101224072307.000|20101224072308.000|CC1|HALF WERE LIVING OUTSIDE THE    
20101224072308.000|20101224072309.000|CC1|SOUTH.                          
20101224072309.000|20101224072311.000|CC1|THERE WERE LIVING FROM          
20101224072311.000|20101224072314.000|CC1|WASHINGTON, D.C. UP TO BOSTON   
20101224072314.000|20101224072316.000|CC1|AND TO CLEVELAND AND CHICAGO,   
20101224072316.000|20101224072317.000|CC1|DETROIT, ALL THE WAY TO LOS     
20101224072317.000|20101224072317.000|CC1|ANGELES.                        
20101224072317.000|20101224072320.000|CC1|ANYWHERE BUT THE SOUTH.         
20101224072320.000|20101224072326.000|CC1|TAVIS: THE PERIOD YOU'RE TALKING
20101224072326.000|20101224072328.000|CC1|ABOUT HAPPENS TO BE AMERICA IN  
20101224072328.000|20101224072329.000|CC1|THE KING YEARS.                 
20101224072329.000|20101224072331.000|CC1|IT COVERS PART OF THE KING      
20101224072331.000|20101224072331.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20101224072331.000|20101224072333.000|CC1|ONE DOES NOT THINK OF IT THAT   
20101224072333.000|20101224072333.000|CC1|WAY.                            
20101224072333.000|20101224072335.000|CC1|WHEN YOU THINK OF DR. KING      
20101224072335.000|20101224072336.000|CC1|FIGHTING FOR JUSTICE AND        
20101224072336.000|20101224072340.000|CC1|EQUALITY AND THE RIGHTS OF BLACK
20101224072340.000|20101224072345.000|CC1|FOLK, YOU THINK OF THEM IN THE  
20101224072345.000|20101224072345.000|CC1|SOUTH.                          
20101224072345.000|20101224072346.000|CC1|IT IS FASCINATING TO THINK THAT 
20101224072346.000|20101224072348.000|CC1|WHILE HE WAS LEADING THIS       
20101224072348.000|20101224072354.000|CC1|MOVEMENT, NEGROES WERE GETTING  
20101224072354.000|20101224072354.000|CC1|OUT OF THE SOUTH.               
20101224072354.000|20101224072357.000|CC1|>> SEE HAVE THE EXPOSURE TO THE 
20101224072357.000|20101224072358.000|CC1|FREEDOM OF THE NORTH AND THAT   
20101224072358.000|20101224072359.000|CC1|WAS IN THE EARLY 50'S.          
20101224072359.000|20101224072402.000|CC1|HE MET HIS WIFE IN THE NORTH.   
20101224072402.000|20101224072404.000|CC1|THAT EVEN -- THERE IS A         
20101224072404.000|20101224072405.000|CC1|CONNECTION THERE BETWEEN THE    
20101224072405.000|20101224072408.000|CC1|GREAT MIGRATION, HE WAS PART OF 
20101224072408.000|20101224072410.000|CC1|THE GREAT MIGRATION FOUR TIMES  
20101224072410.000|20101224072413.000|CC1|AND HE WENT BACK FOR THAT MOMENT
20101224072413.000|20101224072415.000|CC1|OF TRUTH IN THE SOUTH.          
20101224072415.000|20101224072417.000|CC1|TAVIS: WERE THERE FOLKS LIKE HIM
20101224072417.000|20101224072418.000|CC1|WHO ESCAPED THE SOUTH FOR       
20101224072418.000|20101224072421.000|CC1|WHATEVER REASON AND FELT CALLED 
20101224072421.000|20101224072423.000|CC1|BACK?                           
20101224072423.000|20101224072426.000|CC1|>> MOST DID NOT.                
20101224072426.000|20101224072428.000|CC1|MOST LEFT AND THE LEAD FOR GOOD.
20101224072428.000|20101224072431.000|CC1|SOME OF THEM CHANGED THEIR NAME 
20101224072431.000|20101224072431.000|CC1|AND THEY DID NOT LOOK BACK.     
20101224072431.000|20101224072433.000|CC1|WHICH IS WHY THE STORY OFTEN WAS
20101224072433.000|20101224072436.000|CC1|NOT TOLD TO SUCCEEDING          
20101224072436.000|20101224072437.000|CC1|GENERATIONS AND IT NEEDS TO BE. 
20101224072437.000|20101224072439.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY NEEDS TO BE AWARE OF
20101224072439.000|20101224072441.000|CC1|THE SACRIFICE MADE BY THE PEOPLE
20101224072441.000|20101224072446.000|CC1|AND THE IMPACT.                 
20101224072446.000|20101224072447.000|CC1|TAVIS: WHAT IS THE ABIDING      
20101224072447.000|20101224072449.000|CC1|LESSON FOR BLACK PEOPLE OF THIS 
20101224072449.000|20101224072450.000|CC1|MIGRATION?                      
20101224072450.000|20101224072456.000|CC1|>> I HOPE IT WOULD ENCOURAGE    
20101224072456.000|20101224072458.000|CC1|EVERY FAMILY TO EXAMINE THEIR   
20101224072458.000|20101224072458.000|CC1|HISTORY.                        
20101224072458.000|20101224072501.000|CC1|THIS WAS A MIGRATION THAT HAD NO
20101224072501.000|20101224072501.000|CC1|LEADER.                         
20101224072501.000|20101224072503.000|CC1|IT WAS A LEADERLESS MIGRATION.  
20101224072503.000|20101224072507.000|CC1|PEOPLE MADE DECISIONS BASED ON  
20101224072507.000|20101224072509.000|CC1|THEIR HEART AND THIS WAS A STORY
20101224072509.000|20101224072512.000|CC1|OF INSPIRATION THAT SAYS SO MUCH
20101224072512.000|20101224072513.000|CC1|POWER IS WITHIN US.             
20101224072513.000|20101224072517.000|CC1|THOSE PEOPLE MULTIPLIED BY 6    
20101224072517.000|20101224072518.000|CC1|MILLION ENDED UP CHANGING THIS  
20101224072518.000|20101224072519.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20101224072519.000|20101224072520.000|CC1|THAT IS AN INSPIRATION FOR      
20101224072520.000|20101224072522.000|CC1|ANYONE OF ANY RACE BUT

20101224072523.000|20101224072525.000|CC1|PEOPLE NEED TO TALK WITH THE

20101224072526.000|20101224072528.000|CC1|TO FIND OUT WHAT ARE THE STORIES
20101224072528.000|20101224072529.000|CC1|BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.          
20101224072529.000|20101224072531.000|CC1|I FELT A GREAT URGENCY BECAUSE I
20101224072531.000|20101224072533.000|CC1|KNOW PEOPLE WERE PASSING ON AND 
20101224072533.000|20101224072534.000|CC1|I DID NOT HAVE TIME TO GET TO
